product_name: Igloo Yukon Cold Locker Marine Cooler - 20 qt.
long_description: Extremely durable and boasting plenty of space to store food and drinks, the Igloo Yukon 20 qt. Cold Locker Marine Cooler beats the heat so you can enjoy an ice-cold drink after a long, hot day. Rugged rotomolded construction provides exceptional durability; 20 qt. capacity carries enough food and drinks for a day on the river or a solo overnight camping trip. Thick insulating foam in body and lid keeps contents cold; 360degF freezer-style gasket keeps the cold in and heat out; freezer is compatible with dry ice. Stainless steel grab handle allows easy transport; heavy-duty T-grip latches are flexible and resist impact and corrosion. Oversized drain plug allows easy draining; attached stainless steel chain keeps you from misplacing the plug. The Igloo Yukon 20 qt. Cold Locker Marine Cooler features nonmarking, anti-skid feet for stability.
short_description: Extremely durable and boasting plenty of space to store food and drinks, the Igloo Yukon 20 qt. Cold Locker Marine Cooler beats the heat so you can enjoy an ice-cold drink after a long, hot day.
